execution_plan.description: Get distinct IDs of users who are members of any chat (users who joined chats).
Get user details for users returned by step 1 but exclude any users who have sent messages (i.e., users who joined chats but never sent messages in them).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, username, full_name FROM users WHERE id IN ($step1.user_id) AND id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT sended_by FROM messages);
